StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.name: [GetPersonBySSN]
StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.body:
( @SSN varchar(9) ) AS
SET TRANSACTION ISOLATION LEVEL READ UNCOMMITTED
SELECT p.PersonID, p.FirstName, p.LastName, p.NameSu.x, p.SSN, p.MiddleName, p.Title, p.DateOfBirth FROM [dbo].[Person] p WHERE p.SSN = @SSN
